description:
fmt: allow # and x together for strings
Silly and small but easy to be consistent.
To make it worthwhile, I eliminated an allocation when using
%x on a byte slice.

Fixes issue 4149.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=6acb86f980ab ***

fmt: allow # and x together for strings
Silly and small but easy to be consistent.
To make it worthwhile, I eliminated an allocation when using
%x on a byte slice.

Fixes issue 4149.

R=golang-dev, rsc
CC=golang-dev

subject: code review 6574046: fmt: allow # and x together for strings
